metadata.name: The Dawn of Hibernation
metadata.description:
When wealth carries more weight than innocence or guilt,
And when the blade falls upon those unable to afford its fairness,
That is when the spirits of heroes from bygone eras arise

-

'The Dusk of Reclamation' will be airdropped to all bidders of 'The Dawn of Awakening' after the auction ends.
Digital Illustration
3000x4000 px
